full_text: Knitted Christmas trees in DROPS Lima. The piece is worked bottom up. Theme: Christmas. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ DROPS Design: Pattern li-174 Yarn group B SIZE : Width at bottom = 9 cm. Height = 12 cm, without trunk. YARN : DROPS LIMA from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group B) 100 g colour 0705, olive 50 g colour 0100, off white 50 g colour 9024, almond + a left-over colour 2923, goldenrod, for candle flames ACCESSORIES : Wadding. 1 tree weighs approx. 8 g, without wadding. NEEDLES : DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 3 MM. KNITTING TENSION : 23 stitches in width and 32 rows in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm. NOTE: Needle size is only a guide. If you get too many stitches on 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. If you get too few stitches on 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
name: Ravelry: 0-1609 Christmas Woods pattern by DROPS design
